Name: Fightworld
About the game: Gear up and get ready for mayhem! Join up to two friends in gamemodes like Football, and swing your weapon to victory! And hey, participation is free! Become the ultimate Fightworld champion! 3v3 Online Multiplayer Physics-based & Twin Stick Fighting Free to play Full character customization Crazy gamemodes! What's new: Football gamemode! Added the Bow weapon! Gamepad or Controller is strongly recommended when playing this game.
